Name: Diversified Restaurant Holdings, Inc
Description: DELISTED - Diversified Restaurant Holdings, Inc. (DRH) is the owner, operator and franchisor of the full-service restaurant and bar Bagger Dave's Legendary Burger Tavern (Bagger Dave's) and a Buffalo Wild Wings (BWW) franchisee. DRH and its wholly-owned subsidiaries, including AMC Group, Inc, (AMC), AMC Wings, Inc. (WINGS), and AMC Burgers, Inc. (BURGERS), develop, own and operate Bagger Dave's and BWW restaurants located throughout Michigan and Florida. As of April 10, 2012, there was six Bagger Dave's operating in the Greater Detroit region of Michigan with two additional restaurants under development. In November 2011, DRH executed its first area development agreement to franchise six stores in the Midwest. DRH is also a BWW franchisee, and as of April 10, 2012, operated 22 BWW restaurants (14 in Michigan and eight in Florida), with one under construction in Detroit, Michigan. In September 2012, the Company acquired eight BWW's in Indiana and Illinois.
